meanings.definition: A light placed at the side of a vehicle for illumination.
meanings.sent1: The car's sidelights helped light up the road at night.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to turn on your sidelights when driving in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The sidelights on the truck made it look like a glowing spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the warm glow of sidelights on a dark street.
meanings.sent5: The sidelights cast a soft glow, revealing the hidden path ahead.

meanings.definition: A window or other opening in the side of a building.
meanings.sent1: The old house had beautiful sidelights that let in natural light.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the sidelights in the historic building.
meanings.sent3: The cat squeezed through the narrow sidelights to explore the garden.
meanings.sent4: The sidelights of the building framed the view like a picture.
meanings.sent5: Sunlight streamed through the sidelights, brightening the room.

meanings.definition: A piece of information that provides additional insight or perspective.
meanings.sent1: The professor's sidelights on the topic helped clarify the complex theory.
meanings.sent2: Reading the book's sidelights gave me a new understanding of the story.
meanings.sent3: His quirky sidelights on the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting offered sidelights into her creative process.
meanings.sent5: Listening to her sidelights, I realized there was more to the story.
